attributes.action:
Save the AP FILMS / CENTURY 21 Studios from being demolished.
Stirling Road.
attributes.additional_details: Stirling Road, Slough Trading Estate (AP Films/Century 21 Productions - Stingray, Thunderbirds, Captain Scarlet, Joe 90, The Secret Service, UFO effects) 1962-1970
attributes.background:
This building was the home of the legendary productions of Gerry and Sylvia Anderson. "THUNDERBIRDS," "CAPTAIN SCARLET," "JOE 90" etc. A VERY IMPORTANT part of our National TV and Film and Cultural Heritage.
These buildings are under IMMEDIATE THREAT of demolition.
"INTERNATIONAL RESCUE...S.O.S."

rejection.details:
Local planning is not usually a matter for the UK Government or Parliament. You might like to raise the issues you are concerned about with your local councillors. You can find out who your local councillors are here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

The Secretary of State for Communities and Local Government does have some powers to look at specific planning applications. This briefing paper explains more about that process:

www.parliament.uk/briefing-papers/SN00930.pdf
